translation.en: This program is based on real events.
translation.fr: Cette série s'inspire de faits réels,

translation.en: However, certain characters, names, incidents, locations, and dialogue
translation.fr: mais certains personnages,noms, lieux, faits et dialogues ont été romancésà des fins dramatiques.

translation.en: have been fictionalized for dramatic purposes.
translation.fr: et dialogues ont été romancésà des fins dramatiques.

translation.en: Sorry.
What wasn't fictionalized is that my son,
translation.fr: Ce qui n'a pas été romancé,c'est que mon fils

translation.en: at the age of 15, was prescribed OxyContin.
translation.fr: s'est fait prescrire de l'OxyContinà 15 ans.

translation.en: He lived in years and years of addiction.
translation.fr: Il a vécu des années d'addiction.

translation.en: And at the age of 32, he died,
translation.fr: Et à 32 ans, il est mort, seul,

translation.en: all alone in the freezing cold in a gas station parking lot.
translation.fr: dans le froid,sur un parking de station-service.

translation.en: And we miss him.
What the fuck?
[guard] Sir! Sir! Don't do that, sir. Sir--
-No, I've got it. -No, let me do that, sir.
translation.fr: - Non, c'est bon.- Non, laissez-moi faire.

translation.en: There's 220 smoke alarms on the property.
translation.fr: Il y a 220 détecteurs de fuméesur la propriété.

translation.en: -You know I can't sleep. -Oh, sir!
-Very important day. -Goodness.
-I'm so sorry, sir. -I need my rest.
I'm sorry about that. Just please let me do this, sir.
translation.fr: Je suis navré.Laissez-moi faire, s'il vous plaît.

translation.en: Very big day. Dr. Richard needs his rest.
translation.fr: Un grand jour.Dr Richard a besoin de repos.

translation.en: Why does this keep happening? I put batteries in once a month.
translation.fr: Pourquoi ça fait ça ?Je change les piles tous les mois.

translation.en: Well done, well done, well done.
-I'll put a new one up there. -Very good job. It's all right.
translation.fr: - Je vais en mettre une nouvelle.- Bon travail. C'est bon.

translation.en: Don't worry about that now. Just clean up the mess.
translation.fr: Ne vous en faites pas.Nettoyez ce bazar.

translation.en: Actually, would you mind checking the rest of them?
Yes, sir.
Thank you for being here, Ms. Flowers. It means a lot to us.
translation.fr: Merci d'être venue,Mlle Flowers. Ça nous touche.

translation.en: I'm Brianna Ortiz.
This is my associate, Bill Havens.
-An honor to meet you. -How do you do?
-May I call you Edie? -Ms. Flowers will do.
translation.fr: - Je peux vous appeler Edie ?- Mlle Flowers.

translation.en: Of course. Everything all right with your flight?
translation.fr: Bien sûr. Votre vol s'est bien passé ?

translation.en: -It was fine. -Everything's good--?
We can cut the chitchat.
I recognize you're trying to be polite. I've made a note of it. Thank you.
translation.fr: Vous essayez d'être polie.J'en prends note. Merci.

translation.en: -Oh. I just see that you brought your-- -Yes. I changed my flight to 7:15.
translation.fr: - Je vois que vous avez apporté…- Oui. J'ai changé mon vol à 19h15.

translation.en: I'm eager to be home.
But we have the next five hours, so let's make the most of it.
-Where are we doing this? Great. -Just down the hall.
translation.fr: - On fait ça où ? Super.- Au bout du couloir.

translation.en: What do you want to know?
[Brianna] We'll just get right into it. To the right.
translation.fr: On va aller droit au but. À droite.

translation.en: -Welcome. -[Edie] Great.
Hello. Keep your seat.
[Brianna] All right.
As you probably already know,
every state and dozens of cities and counties are suing Purdue Pharma
translation.fr: tous les États et plusieurs villespoursuivent Purdue Pharma

translation.en: for their role in starting the opioid epidemic.
translation.fr: pour leur rôledans l'épidémie des opiacés.

translation.en: It's hundreds of lawsuits that would take decades to resolve,
translation.fr: Des centaines de procès,ça prendrait des décennies.

translation.en: so we've consolidated those lawsuits into a single case
translation.fr: Nous les avons regroupésdans une seule affaire

translation.en: that we believe will bring justice once and for all.
Justice? Okay.
[Brianna] We can't bring people back from the dead, but we can make these people pay.
translation.fr: On peut pas ressusciter les morts,mais on peut les faire payer.

translation.en: So not justice, payment.
I don't know why you need me for this.
translation.fr: Pourquoi vous avez besoin de moi ?

translation.en: You could come up with a number.
Pick the biggest number you can think of, they will pay it, you can call it a win.
translation.fr: Choisissez le plus gros chiffre possible.Ils paieront, et c'est gagné.

translation.en: Ms. Flowers, you might find this frustrating,
and I know you've been through the wringer, but now isn't then.
translation.fr: et je sais que vous en avez bavé,mais les choses ont changé.

translation.en: We have good reason to be optimistic about the outcome.
translation.fr: On a de bonnes raisonsd'être optimistes.

translation.en: [Bill] Why are you here?
-You don't look like you want to be. -I made a promise to someone.
translation.fr: - Vous n'avez pas l'air d'en avoir envie.- Je l'ai promis.

translation.en: But you have access to the same files I did.
translation.fr: Vous avez accèsaux mêmes fichiers que moi.

translation.en: You've seen everything I've seen.
translation.fr: Vous avez vu la même chose.

translation.en: We have. But I have quite a few questions I'd like to get through.
translation.fr: Oui. Mais j'ai des questionsà vous poser.

translation.en: Let's just start with one.
How do you think we got here?
What do I think?
I think you're wasting my time.
translation.fr: Vous me faites perdre mon temps.

translation.en: And yours.
I know how this ends. I've been here before.
translation.fr: Je sais comment ça finit.J'ai déjà connu ça.

translation.en: [Brianna on TV] Would you state your name?
Sir.
[Brianna] You are here today to give testimony in the civil case
translation.fr: Vous êtes venu témoignerdans l'affaire civile

translation.en: pending against Purdue Pharma, makers of OxyContin.
Dr. Sackler, are you aware of that?
That is my understanding.
You deposed Richard Sackler?
[attorney] I want to make it clear that the appearance of Dr. Sackler here today
translation.fr: Je veux préciserque la venue du Dr Sackler

translation.en: is on a voluntary basis.
How did you manage that?
That's it. Go ahead.
I told you, things are different now.
translation.fr: Je vous l'ai dit, les choses ont changé.

translation.en: We're big-game hunting, no mid-level flunkies.
translation.fr: On chasse le gros gibier, pas les laquais.

translation.en: But we need your help to do it.
translation.fr: Mais on a besoin de votre aide.

translation.en: Was...
Was he sitting right here?
-I'm gonna need a different chair. -I'm sorry?
translation.fr: - Il me faut une autre chaise.- Pardon ?

translation.en: Just get me another chair.
Can you take that chair out of the room please?
Thank you.
-Okay, if you need a moment... -[Edie] No.
translation.fr: - Si vous avez besoin d'un moment…- Non.

translation.en: Well, what's next?
When did you first hear about OxyContin?
1998, because of an x-ray machine in Hillsville, Virginia.
translation.fr: En 1998, à cause d'une machineà rayons X à Hillsville, en Virginie. VIRGINIE

translation.en: Well, I am sorry to keep you waiting, Ms. Flowers.
translation.fr: Pardon de vous avoir fait attendre,Mlle Flowers.

translation.en: So, what seems to be the problem?
Good morning, doctor. I need to see your GE 4225 portable x-ray.
translation.fr: Bonjour, docteur. Je veux voirvotre radiographie portable GE 4225.

translation.en: -Oh, so you need an x-ray? -I don't need an x-ray.
translation.fr: - Il vous faut une radio ?- Non.

translation.en: You can put the clipboard down. I'm not a patient.
translation.fr: Posez ça.Je suis pas une patiente.

translation.en: Okay.
An appointment is the only way I can get your full attention.
translation.fr: Un rendez-vous me permetd'attirer votre attention.

translation.en: and now that I have that,
I am Edie Flowers.
I am an investigator with the U.S. attorney's office in Roanoke.
translation.fr: J'enquête pour le bureaudu procureur de Roanoke.

translation.en: Part of my job is to track down doctors
translation.fr: Je traque des médecinsqui facturent le Medicaid

translation.en: who bill Medicaid for procedures they don't perform.
That is fraud, not just to Medicaid, but the American taxpayer.
translation.fr: C'est de la fraude, pour Medicaid,mais aussi pour le contribuable.

translation.en: Before you look at me like that,
translation.fr: Avant de me regarder comme ça,

translation.en: trust me when I say it really is in your best interest
translation.fr: sachez qu'il est dans votre intérêt

translation.en: to show me that x-ray machine.
Please and thank you.
Oh, boy. Yeah. Yeah, okay.
Yeah. There, uh-- There it is.
But I haven't done anything wrong.
translation.fr: Mais je n'ai rien fait de mal.

translation.en: You billed Medicaid for 50 x-rays a day for 30 days straight.
translation.fr: Vous avez facturé 50 radios par jourpendant 30 jours.

translation.en: Not 49, not 51.
And at $107 per x-ray,
this clinic, which you own, earned $160,500.
translation.fr: cette clinique,que vous possédez, a gagné 160 500 $.

translation.en: Do I need to call my lawyer?
Why would you need a lawyer if you didn't do anything wrong?
translation.fr: Pourquoi ?Vous n'avez rien fait de mal, si ?

translation.en: -I'll pay it back. -You're gonna pay me back?
Well, whoever, I'll pay them back.
translation.fr: À qui que ce soit, je le rembourserai.

translation.en: Okay, look, I don't want to lose my practice over this. Please.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas perdre mon cabinet.S'il vous plaît.

translation.en: -There must be some way out of this. -Cooperate.
translation.fr: - Il doit y avoir une solution.- Coopérez.

translation.en: Okay. Okay, I will. Fine.
I need a copy of every invoice over the last two years
translation.fr: Il me faut une copie des factures

translation.en: and I'll make copies of the files on your computers,
translation.fr: et je ferai des copies de vos fichiers.

translation.en: and if there is anything else I should know, anything at all,
translation.fr: S'il y a autre choseque je devrais savoir, quoi que ce soit,

translation.en: it's best you tell me now because if I find it,
translation.fr: il faut le dire maintenant,car si je le découvre,

translation.en: it will make things much worse for you.
Is there anything else I should know?
translation.fr: Il y a autre choseque je devrais savoir ?

translation.en: -Nope. -You sure?
No. No, there is nothing.
There's nothing, I promise.
translation.fr: Il n'y a rien, je le jure.

translation.en: Then let's see those files.
[Edie] At first, the only way you heard about OxyContin
translation.fr: CAROLINE DU NORD Au début, on n'avait vent de l'OxyContin

translation.en: was if Purdue sent one of their reps to visit your local doctor...
translation.fr: que si Purdue envoyaitun représentant chez votre médecin…

translation.en: Chevy going hot. Get her off the lift.
translation.fr: La Chevy est faite. Fais-la descendre.

translation.en: [Edie] ...and you were unlucky enough to get hurt.
translation.fr: … et qu'on avait le malheur de se blesser.

translation.en: Damn, little quicker, huh?
Yeah!
Hey, good morning.
-Just having lunch. -[Glen] Little impromptu lunch, huh?
-[James] Absolutely. -What are you eating?
[Colby] Salami sandwich.
Yeah, so spare needs to be changed here.
translation.fr: Il faut changer la roue de secours.

translation.en: That hasn't been done. Chevy, get off the lift.
translation.fr: Ça n'a pas été fait.Descendez la Chevrolet.

translation.en: -Finish your food and let's go. -[James] We'll get right on it.
translation.fr: - Finissez de manger et allez-y.- Tout de suite.

translation.en: Good job, guys. Really good start today.
translation.fr: Bravo, les gars.La journée commence bien.

translation.en: I mean, what the fuck?
-Ty! Ty! Ty! -[shouting]
Hey!
Hey! Pace it up!
You've done nothing in an hour.
translation.fr: Tu as pas avancé en une heure.

translation.en: All these engines came out of nowhere and I don't know what to do with them.
translation.fr: Ces moteurs sont sortis de nulle part.Je sais pas quoi en faire.

translation.en: This isn't a junkyard we're doing.
Let's get the engines in the bin. I need you in the shop.
translation.fr: Mets-les à la poubelle.J'ai besoin de toi à l'atelier.

translation.en: -I will, I will. -Pull focus.
-Okay! All right! -Here we go.
-I believe in you, man. -I believe in me too.
translation.fr: - Je crois en toi.- Moi aussi.

translation.en: Hey, Mike. Sorry to keep you waiting.
translation.fr: Salut. Pardon de t'avoir fait attendre.

translation.en: Let's get you closed up.
Thanks for waiting, huh?
Come on in.
-Hey, hon. Mike wants to close up. -Hi. Hi, Mike.
translation.fr: - Salut, chérie. Mike veut régler.- Salut, Mike.

translation.en: -Hey! -[Glen] Hi!
-Okay, that comes to... -[Glen] Oh, who is it?
...167 total.
[Glen] Yeah. Hold on.
Things have been slow down at the shop so I appreciate the discount.
translation.fr: C'est calme au magasin,j'apprécie la remise.

translation.en: -[Lily] Oh. No problem. -Discount, hon?
Yeah. You know, that, uh...
You know Maggie left me?
Oh, shoot.
-I did not know that. -Yeah, she took everything but the truck.
translation.fr: - Je ne savais pas.- Elle a tout pris sauf le camion.

translation.en: -Yeah, she took the house. -Oh, yeah?
translation.fr: - Elle a pris la maison.- Ah oui ?

translation.en: She took the dog. She had it attack me when I went to get my shoes.
translation.fr: Le chien m'a attaquéquand je suis allé chercher mes pompes.

translation.en: You know Rhonda who works at the Chevrolet dealership?
translation.fr: Tu connais Rhondade la concession Chevrolet ?

translation.en: -[Glen] I know Rhonda. -Not at the front desk.
Uh, that's who she left me for.
Okay.
-How we doing? -That was intense.
-The discount with Mike? -Oh, come on, he's so sad.
translation.fr: - Une remise pour Mike ?- Il est triste.

translation.en: -[phone ringing] -[Glen] Emotional discounts. I don't know.
translation.fr: Réductions émotionnelles ? - Je sais pas.- Ici Pneus Kryger.

translation.en: Oh, fantastic. Thank you so much. Okay.
-Um-- -What?
Your Accu-turn tire thingy from Italy arrived and is gonna clear Customs
translation.fr: Ton pneu d'Italie vient d'arriveret il va passer la douane.

translation.en: -and get dropped off today at 5:00, yeah. -Italy. Nice.
translation.fr: - Il sera déposé à 17 h.- Italie. Super.

translation.en: How much did that run us?
What was it, like, eight grand?
Eight thousand dollars?
You're the one who wanted a fancy Italian one.
translation.fr: C'est toi qui en voulais un italien.

translation.en: I don't even know what it does.
Honey, just because I want something for $8,000,
translation.fr: Quand je veux un trucqui coûte 8 000 dollars,

translation.en: doesn't mean you're supposed to pull the trigger on it.
translation.fr: tu n'es pas obligée d'être d'accord.

translation.en: You're joking, right? You're actually joking.
-I'm gonna kick you in your-- Oh, my God. -You're running the books.
translation.fr: - Je vais te frapper.- Tu gères les comptes.

translation.en: -Yeah? -I'm going to kill you.
So, we don't like college, huh?
No college.
There goes your college fund.
-Okay. Okay. -Daddy's being mean.
-I love you. -You just go and do your thing out there.
translation.fr: - Je t'aime.- Va faire ce que tu as à faire.

translation.en: This was supposed to be done yesterday, guys.
translation.fr: Ça aurait dû être fait hier.

translation.en: Get it out, it's ready.
Motherfucker.
-Take them off! Take them off! -Why?
-Come on. -Listen to me.
-I'm fucking around. -Yeah, exactly.
-You're fucking around. No more. -Glen.
Do you know how a T-Rex says hi?
translation.fr: Tu sais comment un T-Rex dit bonjour ?

translation.en: Stop fucking around. Hey. Stop. Stop.
-Stop. -Do you know how the T-Rex eats?
translation.fr: - Arrête.- Tu sais comment un T-Rex mange ?

translation.en: -It goes... -Get the fuck out.
Let's go. Turn it off.
-Turn it the f-- -Ah!
-Hey, shut it down. -[Tyler] I can't understand you.
translation.fr: - Éteignez ça.- Je ne t'entends pas. Arrête ! Ça suffit.

translation.en: Shut it down! No more.
-Hey, get out. -Come on, man.
-I'm just fucking around. -Get out.
-I can do it. Come on. -Stop fucking around.
translation.fr: - Je peux le faire.- Arrête de déconner.

translation.en: -I gave you a warning. Did I not? -Yes, you did.
Okay, so what happened?
Nothing happened. You're screwing around.
-Turn the machine off, get in the shop. -I took the music off! Listen--
translation.fr: - Éteins la machine. Va au garage.- J'ai coupé la musique.

translation.en: Oh, shit.
-[shouts] Fuck. -Are you okay? Are you okay?
What is going on?
He fell-- And then the rotator-- -He fell off onto the ground. -Are you okay?
translation.fr: Il est tombé et la dépanneuse…Il est tombé.

translation.en: -[Tyler] Glen, I'm so sorry man, I... -[Glen] Oh, fuck.
[Lily] Do you think you can get up? Grab my shoulder.
translation.fr: Tu peux te lever ? Attrape mon épaule.

translation.en: -My back. There's something in my back. -Okay.
translation.fr: - Mon dos. J'ai un truc dans le dos.- D'accord.

translation.en: -Let's try and stand up. -Let's try to get up.
translation.fr: - Essaie de te lever.- Essaie de te lever.

translation.en: [Tyler] I'm so sorry.
-I was just fucking around. -Slow.
-[Tyler] I didn't mean to throw you off. -Ready? One, two, three, come on.
translation.fr: - J'ai pas fait exprès.- Un, deux, trois, allez.

translation.en: -[screaming] Oh, fuck! -Put him down, put him down!
[Lily] Okay, go call an ambulance.
-[James] Jesus Christ. -[Glen] My back. Oh, fuck.
[surgeon] Retractor.
Next, please.
Suction. There's the ligament damage.
All right, it's out. There's the bone fragment.
translation.fr: C'est bon, je l'ai sorti.Voilà le fragment osseux.

translation.en: I spoke with your surgeon. He said home run, everything was great.
translation.fr: J'ai parlé au chirurgien.Il a dit que tout allait bien.

translation.en: -So now... -Awesome.
...pay attention.
[in German accent] We have to get out of the bed time unt into the med time.
translation.fr: On doit passer de l'heure du lità l'heure de la médication.

translation.en: Right? Pay attention. We have the muscle relaxer.
translation.fr: D'accord ? Écoute bien.On a le relaxant musculaire.

translation.en: That's right.
-We have the steroid for the inflammation. -Okay.
translation.fr: - On a des stéroïdes pour l'inflammation.- D'accord.

translation.en: Unt we have the Vicodin for the pain.
translation.fr: Und de la Vicodine pour la douleur.

translation.en: Thank you.
-With food? -With food. Yeah!
Schnitzel from the pig!
[Lily] Okay.
[in normal voice] So, I will see you next week for a checkup.
translation.fr: On se voit la semaine prochainepour un bilan.

translation.en: Uh, yeah, the 25th.
Glen, you did good. Everything's gonna be fine.
translation.fr: Glen, tu t'en sors bien. Tout ira bien.

translation.en: -Thanks, Dr. Hartman. -Bye, gang.
Richard attached himself to an endless supply of customers,
translation.fr: Richard s'est liéà une source infinie de clients,

translation.en: people in pain,
and people with no option other than to get better.
translation.fr: et qui n'ont pas d'autre choixque d'aller mieux.

translation.en: Try lifting the feet up, both at a time. Up.
translation.fr: Levez les deux pieds en même temps.

translation.en: It's a little more difficult. A little more advanced. And holding.
translation.fr: C'est un peu plus dur.Plus avancé. Et tenez.

translation.en: Breathing. Again. Inhale, exhale.
-Lower the legs maybe two inches. -[Glen] This sucks.
translation.fr: - Baissez les jambes de 5 cm.- Ça craint.

translation.en: Why is that so painful?
[woman] The muscles are stretching when you do that, okay?
translation.fr: Les muscles s'étirentquand vous faites ça.

translation.en: Relax. Excellent. Let's try something different.
-And 90 degrees, holding. -[Glen] Easy, please.
[woman] Gently lowering them down a few inches.
And, breathe, breathe, breathe.
-Keeping the back down, flat. -God, this fucking sucks.
translation.fr: - Le dos à plat.- Putain, ça craint.

translation.en: -[woman] Push on my hands. -I can't.
translation.fr: - Poussez mes mains.- Je peux pas.

translation.en: [woman] Okay, okay. I know it's frustrating, but you got it.
translation.fr: D'accord. Je sais que c'est frustrant,mais c'est bien.

translation.en: You're doing well. Doing really well. This is a long process.
translation.fr: Vous vous en sortez bien. Très bien.C'est un long processus.

translation.en: [Glen] Uh, yeah.
[woman] I've seen a lot of cases like yours,
translation.fr: J'ai vu plein de cas comme celui-ci.

translation.en: and you have to know that this is something you're living with now, okay?
translation.fr: Sachez que vous allez devoirvivre avec ça, désormais.

translation.en: [Glen] Okay.
This is your new reality. And draw the knees up.
translation.fr: C'est votre nouvelle réalité.Et levez les genoux.

translation.en: Let's try five more.
-All the way up. Five more. -Okay.
This isn't just about a pill that killed a lot of people.
translation.fr: C'est pas juste une pilulequi a tué beaucoup de gens.

translation.en: It's bigger than that.
No, this thing, this plague,
it started when someone in that family
translation.fr: quand quelqu'un de sa famillea réalisé qu'on peut gagner gros

translation.en: realized that the big money in medicine was in sales and marketing.
translation.fr: dans le domaine de la médecineen faisant du commerce et du marketing.

translation.en: And lies.
-You're referring to Arthur Sackler? -[Edie] Yeah.
Arthur Sackler started this whole thing.
translation.fr: C'est Arthur Sackler qui a lancé tout ça.

translation.en: He was a psychiatrist at the eve of the pharmaceutical revolution.
translation.fr: Il était psychiatre à la veillede la révolution pharmaceutique.

translation.en: In those days, the go to move in mental health was a lobotomy.
translation.fr: La lobotomie était la procédure pharepour soigner les malades.

translation.en: But lobotomies are a one-shot deal.
translation.fr: Mais une lobotomie,ça ne se pratique qu'une fois.

translation.en: No repeat customers.
Arthur realized with the right pill, he'd have a customer for life.
translation.fr: Arthur comprit qu'avec la bonne pilule,il aurait un client à vie.

translation.en: And he branded the new pill...
A lobotomy in a bottle.
[Edie] He found out he was a better salesman than a doctor, so he went out and bought himself two things:
translation.fr: Il a saisi qu'il était meilleur vendeurque médecin, alors il acheta deux choses :

translation.en: a drug company and the country's largest medical advertising agency.
translation.fr: un laboratoire pharmaceutiqueet la plus grande agence de pub médicale.

translation.en: He knew that marketing was the future of pills
translation.fr: Il savait que le marketingétait l'avenir des pilules

translation.en: and he hit the jackpot when they got the contract for Valium,
translation.fr: et il a décroché le jackpotquand il a eu le contrat du Valium,

translation.en: creating the world's first blockbuster drug.
translation.fr: créant le premier médicamentà succès au monde.

translation.en: [Arthur] The drug you never knew you needed.
[Edie] And then he was rich and he wanted everyone to know it.
translation.fr: Il est devenu riche et il a vouluque tout le monde le sache.

translation.en: He bought a bunch of old, fancy art.
translation.fr: Il a acheté de vieilles œuvres d'art,

translation.en: He put his name on any museum, school or hospital that would take his money,
translation.fr: donné son nom aux musées, écoleset hôpitaux qui prenaient son argent.

translation.en: and they all did.
I think it made him feel immortal.
To him, legacy was everything.
[all] Sackler!
[Edie] He lorded that legacy over his whole family,
translation.fr: Il a régné sur toute sa famille,

translation.en: and like a lot of families of really rich people,
they couldn't wait for him to die.
They wouldn't have to wait long.
-Excuse me. -Yes?
I need to speak to a doctor.
[nurse] Sir, you need to sign in first over there.
translation.fr: Il faut d'abord signer le registre.

translation.en: [Edie] On May 26, 1987, he drove himself to the emergency room
translation.fr: Le 26 mai 1987,il s'est rendu aux urgences

translation.en: at Columbia Presbyterian Hospital and announced:
translation.fr: de l'hôpital de Columbia et a dit…

translation.en: My name is Dr. Arthur Sackler. I'm having a heart attack.
translation.fr: Je suis le Dr Arthur Sackler.Je fais une crise cardiaque.

translation.en: I have a blockage of my proximal left anterior descending artery.
translation.fr: Mon artère descendanteproximale gauche est obstruée.

translation.en: I need a balloon angioplasty right now or I won't survive.
translation.fr: Il me faut une angioplastieou je ne survivrai pas.

translation.en: [nurse] Okay, let's start from the top. Let's start from the top. Sir?
translation.fr: Reprenons depuis le début.Depuis le début. Monsieur ?

translation.en: -I'm Dr. Arthur Sackler. -[nurse] Sir, I need you to come back.
translation.fr: - Je suis le Dr Arthur Sackler.- Revenez.

translation.en: I'm having a heart attack.
I have a blockage of my proximal left anterior descending artery.
translation.fr: Mon artère descendanteproximale gauche est bloquée.

translation.en: I need a balloon angioplasty now or I won't survive.
translation.fr: Il me faut une angioplastieou je ne survivrai pas.

translation.en: [doctor] I'm gonna need you to calm down for a minute.
Sir? Where are you--? Sir? Nurse!
[nurse] Some help here.
Stop wasting time.
I have a blockage of my proximal left anterior descending artery.
translation.fr: Mon artère descendanteproximale gauche est obstruée.

translation.en: I need the angio-- [doctor] Let's see what the EKG has to say.
translation.fr: - Il me faut l'angio…- Voyons ce que dit l'ECG.

translation.en: Stop wasting time. Do what I say.
translation.fr: Arrêtez. Faites ce que je dis.

translation.en: -[doctor] You're doing great. -[grunts]
[doctor] Well, it looks like-- Hey, you were right.
translation.fr: On dirait que… Vous aviez raison.

translation.en: Yeah, I'm always fucking right.
Oh, boy.
[nurse] Time of death 7:58 p.m.
[Edie] Arthur may have created the modern pharmaceutical business
and made the family millions, but it was his nephew, Richard,
translation.fr: et a rendu la famille riche,mais c'est son neveu, Richard,

translation.en: who unleashed a monster...
Right this way, Dr. Sackler.
[Edie] ...and made them billions.
translation.fr: … qui leur a rapporté des milliards.

translation.en: It would take 10 years,
but... I think the passing of some mantle from Arthur to Richard
translation.fr: mais… je pense que le passagede flambeau d'Arthur à Richard

translation.en: was the beginning of OxyContin.
translation.fr: a marqué le début de l'OxyContin.

translation.en: And now that Arthur was out of the picture,
Richard had a plan.
But first he needed one key ingredient,
translation.fr: D'abord, il lui fallait un ingrédient clé,

translation.en: and the only thing that stood in his way was a big dysfunctional family.
translation.fr: et la seule chose qui le ralentissaitétait une famille dysfonctionnelle.

translation.en: -What's the point of talking about this? -How long is this going to take?
translation.fr: - Pourquoi on parle de ça ?- Ça va prendre combien de temps ?

translation.en: -Stanley, we need to know what's going on. -Let him talk!
translation.fr: - Stanley, dis-nous ce qui se passe.- Laisse-le parler !

translation.en: We're trying! Goddamn it, Stanley, what are we getting?
It seems that Arthur hypothecated a great deal of art and money over the years.
translation.fr: Arthur a hypothéqué beaucoup d'artet d'argent au fil des années.

translation.en: What the hell does "hypothecated" mean?
It means he owes money. And not just money, art.
translation.fr: Qu'il doit de l'argent.Et pas que de l'argent, de l'art.

translation.en: There are some sizable debts to Harvard, the Met, the Smithsonian, Columbia...
translation.fr: Il a de grosses dettes auprès d'Harvard,du Met, du Smithsonian, de Columbia…

translation.en: And who's going to pay that?
[Stanley] Well, Arthur had several businesses and he added your names to many of them.
translation.fr: Il avait plusieurs affaires et il a ajoutévos noms à beaucoup d'entre elles.

translation.en: -All right, which businesses? -[Stanley] Okay. [clears throat]
Uh, Douglas McAdams, Medical Tribune International,
Napp Pharmaceuticals, MD publications...
-Have you--? -I've never heard of--
...Medimetriks, Purdue Frederick MRS, IMS, MSCDC.
I haven't heard of any of these businesses.
[Stanley] Your names are all over them.
I suggest you liquidate to pay these debts because, as I said, they are sizable.
translation.fr: Je vous suggère de liquider pour réglerles dettes, car elles sont importantes.

translation.en: -Stanley, was Dad broke? -No, no, no. Well, maybe.
translation.fr: - Stanley, papa était fauché ?- Non. Enfin, peut-être.

translation.en: -Take Purdue. -That's a terrible idea.
translation.fr: - Prenez Purdue.- C'est une mauvaise idée.

translation.en: They're going to divide it all up so that we get little pieces? No.
translation.fr: Ils vont tout diviser et nous laisserdes petits morceaux ? Non.

translation.en: Give them everything and exchange it for Purdue.
Purdue's got only one drug that's worth anything, MS Contin.
translation.fr: Purdue n'a qu'un médicament de valeur :MS Contin.

translation.en: Right now, it's a niche drug for people who are dying of cancer.
translation.fr: C'est un médicament nichepour les cancéreux.

translation.en: When the patent runs out, we got fuck all.
translation.fr: Quand le brevet sera fini, on aura rien.

translation.en: You were in there, you got fuck all now.
translation.fr: Tu y étais, tu n'as plus rien.

translation.en: Purdue is a real company, bought by you and Arthur.
translation.fr: Purdue est une vraie société,achetée par Arthur et toi.

translation.en: They actually make something. Those people in there don't understand.
translation.fr: Ils fabriquent quelque chose.Ils ne comprennent pas.

translation.en: They've never made anything in their entire lives except fucking chitchat.
translation.fr: Ils n'ont jamais rien fait de leur vie,à part papoter.

translation.en: No! No! We're not gonna--
translation.fr: Non ! Non ! On ne va pas…

translation.en: We'll let them eat canapés, we'll make something.
Yeah, but you've never brought a drug to market, son.
translation.fr: Tu n'as jamais lancé de médicament.

translation.en: It takes a decade, and we've got nothing in the pipeline.
translation.fr: Ça prend dix ans,et on n'a rien sur le feu.

translation.en: -It's a dead end. -We know pain.
translation.fr: - C'est mort.- On connaît la douleur.

translation.en: Yeah, that's for damn sure.
We developed MS Contin, we understand pain.
translation.fr: On a développé MS Contin,on comprend la douleur.

translation.en: I understand pain.
All of human behavior is essentially comprised of two things:
translation.fr: Le comportement humainse résume à deux choses :

translation.en: running away from pain and toward pleasure.
translation.fr: fuir la douleur et rechercher le plaisir.

translation.en: It's a cycle.
Run from pain, run toward pleasure.
translation.fr: Fuir la douleur, atteindre le plaisir.

translation.en: Pain, pleasure, pain, pleasure.
Again and again.
Well, this circle is our existence.
It is the very essence of what it means to be human, to be alive.
translation.fr: C'est l'essence même de ce que signifieêtre humain, être vivant.

translation.en: But if we place ourselves right there, between pain and pleasure...
translation.fr: Mais si on se placeentre la douleur et le plaisir,

translation.en: If we become the gatekeepers for everyone who wants to get away from pain,
translation.fr: si on devient les gardiens de ceuxqui veulent échapper à la douleur,

translation.en: then we have changed the world.
translation.fr: alors on aura changé le monde.

translation.en: We finish what Arthur started.
translation.fr: On finira ce qu'il a commencé.

translation.en: And you will never have to worry about money ever again.
translation.fr: Et tu n'auras plus jamaisà te soucier de l'argent.

translation.en: -Fuck yeah. -Yeah.
[Bill] Purdue goes on to develop one of the most powerful painkillers
translation.fr: Purdue développeun des plus puissants analgésiques

translation.en: to ever hit the market, while telling us it's perfectly safe.
translation.fr: qu'on connaisseen affirmant qu'il est sans danger.

translation.en: Besides money, what do you think motivated Sackler?
Napoleon was short, so he conquered Europe.
translation.fr: Napoléon était petit,il a conquis l'Europe.

translation.en: Batman's Batman because his parents got killed.
translation.fr: Batman est Batmancar ses parents sont morts.

translation.en: -Is that what you're asking? -Yeah.
In college, he tried inventing a pill that could give you an orgasm.
translation.fr: À la fac, il a voulu inventer une pilulequi donne un orgasme.

translation.en: He loved vacationing in Thailand.
His favorite vegetable is the asparagus, and I don't give a shit the motivation.
translation.fr: L'asperge est son légume préféré.Je me fous de tout ça.

translation.en: It doesn't matter because he did it.
I'm sure even if you knew the reason, it wouldn't make you feel any better.
translation.fr: Même si on savait pourquoi,on ne se sentirait pas mieux.

translation.en: What about you, Ms. Flowers? What motivated you?
translation.fr: Et vous, Mlle Flowers ?Qu'est-ce qui vous motivait ?

translation.en: The only thing I had: work.
translation.fr: La seule chose que j'avais : le travail.

translation.en: That's it? Just work?
Just work.
-["Blow Your Whistle" playing] -[children laughing, chattering]
[Edie] Yes, yes, yes!
♪ Shake your tambourine and blow... ♪
Fuck! Come on.
Shit.
Shit.
Shit, shit, shit.
[operator] You have reached the Tomb Raider helpline. -The charge is two d-- -[keypad beeping]
translation.fr: Ici le centre d'aide de Tomb Raider.Le coût est de…

translation.en: -Hi, it's Edie. -[man] Hello, Ms. Edie. How are you?
translation.fr: - C'est Edie.- Bonjour, Mlle Edie. Ça va ?

translation.en: Yeah, I'm about two minutes into Level 14.
In Atlantis, in the pool room, and I don't know how to get through it.
translation.fr: à Atlantis, dans la salle.Je sais pas quoi faire.

translation.en: I've died 16 times.
Hello?
You need to move across the space two times.
translation.fr: Il faut traverser l'espace deux fois.

translation.en: -First, you spring the traps. -Hang on. Mm-hm.
-Then you get out of the-- -Okay. I got it.
Well done. Now turn to your left, climb the tallest block and jump to the...
translation.fr: Bravo. Tournez à gauche,escaladez le bloc du haut et sautez…

translation.en: There's a dragon up ahead at the third column.
translation.fr: Il y a un dragon sur la troisième colonne.

translation.en: -Thank you. -My pleasure, Ms. Edie.
-If there's anything else I can do... -No.
translation.fr: - Si je peux faire autre chose…- Non.

translation.en: I'm good. Good night.
Or good morning, wherever you are.
translation.fr: Ou bonjour, où que vous soyez.

translation.en: I am a bureaucrat.
Bureaucracy is what holds us together.
It's what keeps society organized, functioning, moving.
translation.fr: C'est ce qui fait fonctionner la société.

translation.en: There's no civilization without bureaucracy.
translation.fr: Il n'y a pas de civilisationsans bureaucratie.

translation.en: Spreadsheets are what keep the world from collapsing, and...
translation.fr: Sans feuilles de calcul,le monde s'effondrerait.

translation.en: I was good at my job.
♪ Chuck baby don't give a what... ♪
I'll need a copy of every invoice over the last two years.
translation.fr: Il me faut toutes vos factures.

translation.en: Green for legitimate charges.
Anything else you think I should know?
translation.fr: Autre chose que je dois savoir ?

translation.en: Yellow for fraudulent charges I was already aware of,
translation.fr: Jaune pour les charges frauduleusesdont j'étais informée

translation.en: and red, red is when I was lied to.
-There is nothing. -You sure?
I promise.
♪ Chuck baby don't give a... ♪
When the red came out, that tended to turn things fun for me.
translation.fr: Quand il y avait du rouge,je m'amusais beaucoup.

translation.en: By 1998, not a lot of people had heard of OxyContin.
translation.fr: En 1998, peu de gensavaient eu vent de l'OxyContin.

translation.en: Even if you had, you probably had no clue what it could do.
translation.fr: Et si c'était le cas,on ignorait ce que ça faisait.

translation.en: And that was the idea.
It was essential to Richard's plan.
Now that the Sacklers had Purdue,
they needed to find a drug they could sell.
translation.fr: il leur fallait un médicament à vendre.

translation.en: A blockbuster.
And Richard was making a big bet on pain.
translation.fr: Et Richard misait gros sur la douleur.

translation.en: Okay. Okay, good boy.
Here you go, good boy.
Aren't you such a good boy?
Such a good boy. Are you ready?
translation.fr: Un bon chien. Tu es prêt ?

translation.en: Are you ready to make the donuts with me? Are you ready to make some money, Unchie?
translation.fr: Tu es prêt à faire des donuts ?Prêt à gagner de l'argent ?

translation.en: I love you so much.
That's it. That's it, boy. Come on, boy. Come on.
translation.fr: C'est ça. Oui, mon chien.Allez, viens. Allez.

translation.en: Good morning. Good morning.
Come on, boy. That's a good boy. You're a good boy.
translation.fr: Allez, mon chien. C'est bien.Tu es un bon chien.

translation.en: You're such a good boy. I'll pick you up for now.
translation.fr: Bon chien. Je vais te porter.

translation.en: But he wasn't starting from scratch.
translation.fr: Mais il partait pas de zéro.

translation.en: For over 15 years, Purdue had been making and marketing
a morphine-based painkiller called MS Contin.
translation.fr: un analgésique à base de morphineappelé MS Contin.

translation.en: So OxyContin just needed a little recipe tweaking.
translation.fr: L'OxyContin avait besoind'un ajustement de recette.

translation.en: [Kaiko] MS Contin has two elements.
Of course, there's the Contin,
translation.fr: Bien sûr, il y a la Contin,

translation.en: our candy coating that dissolves slowly in the digestive tract...
translation.fr: l'enrobage sucré qui se dissout lentementdans le tube digestif

translation.en: -Mm-hm. -...which gives the system it's time-release property.
translation.fr: et permet une libération prolongéedu principe actif.

translation.en: And then there's the milk chocolatey center,
translation.fr: Et puis, il y a le cœurde chocolat au lait,

translation.en: morphine sulfate, MS--
translation.fr: le sulfate de morphine, la MS…

translation.en: And when we developed MS Contin,
translation.fr: Quand on a développé le MS Contin,

translation.en: was there any plan for a second generation?
translation.fr: y avait-il un projetde deuxième génération ?

translation.en: -No. -Why not?
Because morphine works well.
It's well-understood
which made it relatively easy to get approval from the FDA.
translation.fr: ce qui a facilitél'obtention de l'accord de la FDA.

translation.en: Well, morphine is not the only opiate that works well.
translation.fr: La morphinen'est pas le seul opiacé efficace.

translation.en: It is the only opiate that's associated with death.
translation.fr: C'est le seul opiacé associé à la mort.

translation.en: I would like to make a painkiller that people associate
with improved well-being, with life.
translation.fr: que les gens associerontau bien-être et à la vie.

translation.en: Let's make something new.
Can you do that?
This was the birth of a bad idea.
-Sure. -Then do it.
[Edie] They took one type of heroin wrapped in a time-release coating
translation.fr: Ils ont remplacé un type d'héroïnede son enrobage à longue durée

translation.en: and swapped it for a much stronger one.
[Arthur] I like it.
It's a little dangerous.
Be careful.
But I like it.
[woman 1] Okay...
I'll say a word
and you say the first thing that comes into your minds.
translation.fr: et vous ditesce qui vous vient à l'esprit.

translation.en: Anyone can go first. All right.
Codeine.
[man 1] Dentist.
[man 2] Cough syrup.
[man 3] Wisdom teeth.
[woman 2] Sleep aid.
-[man 4] Fever. -[woman 1] Ah. Thank you.
Now, what about "morphine"?
[man 1] Death.
[man 3] Cancer.
[man 2] Addicts.
[woman 2] Severe pain.
All right, now tell me what words you associate with "oxycodone."
[man 3] Is... Is that Percocet?
[man 2] "Oxy", it's like a pulmonary thing.
[man 1] Like, oxygen?
Hey. What the hell?
Something the matter?
You see? You see, they all have an idea about morphine,
translation.fr: Tu vois ?Ils ont tous une idée sur la morphine,

translation.en: but oxycodone is a clean slate.
Nobody has any associations with it. We can make it whatever we want.
translation.fr: Personne ne l'associe à rien.On peut en faire ce qu'on veut.

translation.en: So you want to take a drug with twice the kick of morphine
translation.fr: Tu vas prendre un médicamentavec deux fois plus de morphine

translation.en: and give it to everybody?
translation.fr: et le donner à tout le monde ?

translation.en: Yes. Yes, I do.
Abuse is gonna be a real issue.
[both] When a patient is under the supervision of their physician,
translation.fr: Quand un patient est supervisépar son médecin,

translation.en: these drugs are incredibly safe.
If I may, I don't think that's entirely accurate.
translation.fr: Je ne pense pas que ce soit avéré.

translation.en: -Even with MS Contin, we saw abuse of-- -[Raymond] Yes, yes, yes. All right.
translation.fr: - Même avec MS Contin, on a vu des abus…- Oui, c'est vrai.

translation.en: So we are going to take a very powerful drug
translation.fr: On va prendre un médicament très puissant

translation.en: and put it into the hands of potentially millions of new people?
translation.fr: et le donnerà des millions de personnes ?

translation.en: Yes. Yes, that's right.
Under the care of their physician.
And with full FDA approval.
translation.fr: Et avec l'approbation de la FDA.

translation.en: Here.
Look at this.
Doctors currently prescribe morphine here
translation.fr: Les médecins prescrivent la morphine ici,

translation.en: because morphine is death.
translation.fr: car la morphine, c'est la mort.

translation.en: But with oxycodone, our new patients are here.
translation.fr: Mais avec l'oxycodone,nos nouveaux patients sont là.

translation.en: [Edie] This is the moment
I think this whole thing could've been stopped.
translation.fr: que tout ça aurait pu être arrêté.

translation.en: If Raymond or Mortimer or anyone else had just said no,
translation.fr: Si Raymond, Mortimerou l'un d'eux avait dit non,

translation.en: you and I would not be talking
and there would be a lot of people at dinner with their families right now.
translation.fr: et beaucoup de gens seraienten train de dîner en famille.

translation.en: I know you're scared. I know you're concerned.
translation.fr: Vous avez peur et vous êtes inquiets.

translation.en: This story is a tragedy.
But we're gonna give a lot of people their lives back.
translation.fr: On va rendre leur vie à plein de gens.

translation.en: We're gonna take away a lot of pain.
translation.fr: On va soulager beaucoup de douleur.

translation.en: What do we call it?
OxyContin.
The drug you never knew you needed.
translation.fr: Ce dont on ignorait avoir besoin.

translation.en: The drug you never knew you needed.
translation.fr: Ce dont on ignorait avoir besoin.

translation.en: [Edie] Richard had his designer drug.
translation.fr: Richard avait sa drogue de synthèse.

translation.en: What do you think?
OxyContin was born.
Richard had his big idea:
a drug that people in need could not refuse.
translation.fr: un médicamentdont les gens avaient besoin.

translation.en: And that was only half the plan, and not even the worst half.
translation.fr: Et c'était que la moitié du plan,et même pas la pire moitié.

translation.en: This is where Uncle Arthur's influence came in.
He was a salesman
and knew your product is only as good as the message it comes with.
translation.fr: il savait qu'un produit n'est bonque s'il fait passer un message.

translation.en: Richard knew exactly what that message was,
translation.fr: Richard savait quel était le message,

translation.en: and more importantly, how to send it.
translation.fr: et surtout, comment le faire passer.

translation.en: He went about putting together a sales force
translation.fr: Il a monté une équipe de vente

translation.en: to get the word out about OxyContin.
They recruited good-looking college graduates
translation.fr: Ils ont recruté de belles diplômées

translation.en: who could speak a doctor's language,
and then they programmed the shit out of them.
[Britt] Temperature, heart rate, respiratory rate, and blood pressure.
translation.fr: Température, rythme cardiaque,respiration et tension artérielle.

translation.en: These are known as the vital signs. Do you know what is not a vital sign?
translation.fr: Ce sont les signes vitaux.Vous savez ce qui n'en est pas un ?

translation.en: Pain.
Pain is the last thing a medical professional will consider
translation.fr: La douleur est la dernière choseà laquelle un médecin pense

translation.en: when they care for you.
Or your grandmother.
Or your boyfriend.
-[Shannon] Hello, Frank. -Shannon.
Pain has long been understood to be a symptom of injury or disease,
translation.fr: La douleur était perçue comme le symptômed'une blessure, d'une maladie,

translation.en: not something to treat in and of itself.
translation.fr: pas comme une chose à soigner en soi.

translation.en: [woman] Hey! So, you're just gonna sit there and eat Cap'n Crunch all day?
translation.fr: Tu vas manger des céréalestoute la journée ?

translation.en: Finish the car.
-[Frank] When I'm done. -[woman] When you're done?
Three full bowls of fucking Cap'n Crunch.
translation.fr: Tu es au troisième bol de céréales.

translation.en: -[Frank] Tires ain't going nowhere. -[woman] You're a degenerate.
translation.fr: Les pneus bougeront pas. T'es un dégénéré.

translation.en: You're gonna blow up my toilets with that Cap'n Crunch.
translation.fr: Tu vas faire explosermes toilettes avec ça.

translation.en: -It's disgusting! I'm taking it. -I'm playing.
translation.fr: - C'est dégoûtant ! Je le prends.- Je joue.

translation.en: [woman] I'm taking it and turning it off. Get out, go on.
translation.fr: Je le prends et je l'éteins. Sors, allez.

translation.en: [Britt] Doctors don't respect pain.
translation.fr: Les médecins ne respectent pas la douleur.

translation.en: -Because they don't understand it. -["Sabotage" playing]
translation.fr: DIRECTEUR RÉGIONAL DES VENTES Ils ne la comprennent pas.

translation.en: A medical education is what, seven years?
Do you know how much direct instruction medical students receive on pain?
translation.fr: Savez-vous combien de temps on étudiela douleur, en médecine ?

translation.en: Forty-eight minutes.
Patients don't need to adjust their lives to deal with pain.
translation.fr: Les patients n'ont pasà adapter leur vie à la douleur.

translation.en: Doctors need to adjust their treatment of it.
Pain is no longer something that we have to tolerate.
translation.fr: On n'a plus à tolérer la douleur.

translation.en: It is something we can overcome.
-Hi. -Here you go.
My name is Shannon.
-Thank you. -[man] You got it.
We have a way to overcome it.
translation.fr: On a un outil pour surmonter ça.

translation.en: We have an answer.
OxyContin.
That's the answer.
If you're a good fit for us,
translation.fr: Si vous êtes à la hauteur,

translation.en: you will join our crusade to help change the way Americans deal with their pain.
translation.fr: vous rejoindrez notre croisadepour changer la façon de gérer la douleur.

translation.en: At Purdue, we've spent years developing OxyContin.
translation.fr: À Purdue, on a passé des annéesà développer l'OxyContin.

translation.en: An effective, long lasting and safe treatment for pain
translation.fr: Un traitement contre la douleurefficace et sûr,

translation.en: with broad application to a wide range of patients.
translation.fr: et adapté à un large éventail de patients.

translation.en: But you'll have to do more than sell this treatment.
translation.fr: Mais vous devrez faire plusque vendre ce traitement.

translation.en: You will be convincing doctors to take pain seriously.
translation.fr: Vous convaincrez les médecinsde prendre la douleur au sérieux.

translation.en: Make no mistake.
You will be part of a beautiful, glorious,
translation.fr: Vous allez contribuerà une glorieuse, sublime

translation.en: wonderful revolution of life transformation.
translation.fr: et merveilleuse révolution de la vie.

translation.en: [Britt] Say it with me:
-"Beautiful." -[crowd] Beautiful.
-[Britt] "Wonderful." -[crowd] Wonderful.
-"Glorious." -[crowd] Glorious.
-[Britt] "Revolution." -[crowd] Revolution.
-[Britt] And "life transformation." -[crowd] Life transformation.
[Britt] One more time!
-"Beautiful." -[crowd] Beautiful.
-[Britt] "Wonderful." -[crowd] Wonderful.
-[Britt] "Glorious." -[crowd] Glorious.
-[Britt] "Revolution." -[crowd] Revolution.
-[Britt] And "life transformation!" -[crowd] Life transformation!
translation.fr: - Et "Transformation de la vie !"- Transformation de vie !

translation.en: You made the right decision. You know that, right?
translation.fr: Tu as bien fait de venir.Tu le sais, non ?

translation.en: -For sure. -Are you excited?
Totally.
You were really good up there.
-Thank you. -Seriously.
Hey, can I ask you a question?
translation.fr: Je peux te poser une question ?

translation.en: I was wondering when my first paycheck will arrive.
translation.fr: Je me demandais quand je serai payée.

translation.en: What do you need? Just need to know when I'm gonna get paid.
translation.fr: - Qu'est-ce qu'il te faut ?- La date de paiement.

translation.en: Because you're broke and you need a place to live.
translation.fr: Tu es fauchée et tu as besoin d'un toit.

translation.en: You can stay with me.
A bunch of the other girls did when they were trying to get on their feet.
translation.fr: D'autres l'ont faitquand elles essayaient de survivre.

translation.en: We'll get money in your pocket and then find you a place to live.
translation.fr: On va te trouver de l'argentet un logement.

translation.en: Seriously, I have an extra room.
-Really? -Really.
-Thank you. -You're welcome.
-Let me ask you a question. -Yeah?
Do you have MS or scoliosis or something?
-No. -All right. Then stand up straight.
Don't walk around like this.
You deserve to be here.
[commentator] Deon Dyer snapping the tie and gives the Tar Heels the lead...
translation.fr: Deon Dyer offre l'avantage aux Tar Heels…

translation.en: Oh, fuck.
Oh, fuck. God.
Fuck, shit.
Lil, I need you for a sec. Can you come here for a second?
translation.fr: Lil, j'ai besoin de toi.Tu peux venir une seconde ?

translation.en: I got a treat.
Yep, that's what just happened.
Just a bunch of piss.
-This is just-- -What did you do?
translation.fr: - C'est juste…- Tu as fait quoi ?

translation.en: I spilled a bottle of piss all over myself.
translation.fr: Je me suis renversé de la pisse dessus.

translation.en: Oh, my God. Okay.
-It's a lot. -It's everywhere. Cute.
translation.fr: - Y en a plein.- Partout. Top.

translation.en: -Okay. -Oh, thanks.
-[Tyler] Can I help? Can I do something? -Can you grab me--?
translation.fr: - Je peux t'aider ?- Tu peux m'attraper…

translation.en: [Glen] Ty, come here for a sec.
-Come get a good look at this. -[Lily] No, it's fine.
translation.fr: - Viens voir ça.- Non, ça va.

translation.en: Can you grab me a couple towels? Can you lift your butt for me?
translation.fr: Apporte des serviettes.Tu peux soulever tes fesses ?

translation.en: I changed Kaylee. You could've timed it better.
translation.fr: J'ai changé Kaylee.Tu aurais pu mieux…

translation.en: -This is ridiculous. -You're so gross.
[Tyler] I hear make out sounds and there's pee involved, so that's, you know...
translation.fr: J'entends des bruits bizarreset il y a de l'urine, alors…

translation.en: You may want to stay in the bedroom.
translation.fr: Tu devrais rester dans la chambre.

translation.en: Do you want me to give you a sexy sponge bath?
translation.fr: Tu veux un bain sexy à l'éponge ?

translation.en: God, it's just...
You're fine.
Okay?
-Look at me. -I just can't stop laughing.
I know. You're gonna be fine.
That's the best view in Ohio.
translation.fr: C'est la plus belle vue de l'Ohio.

translation.en: Here's your bedroom.
Make yourself at home.
And use all those drawers, they're all yours.
translation.fr: Utilise ces tiroirs, ils sont à toi.

translation.en: -It's great. -I hope you like purple.
Yeah, I love purple.
This is our bathroom, we'll share it.
translation.fr: Notre salle de bain, on la partage.

translation.en: Toilet, steam shower.
That bath tub is amazing.
And that's a Moroccan Rose bath oil, you can use it.
translation.fr: C'est de l'huile de rose marocaine,tu peux l'utiliser.

translation.en: This is the living room, obviously, and up there is the private roof deck
translation.fr: Là, c'est le salon, et là-haut,la terrasse privée

translation.en: with a killer fucking Jacuzzi.
You got a car?
Uh, yeah, it's my mom's, but I'm using it right now.
translation.fr: Oui. C'est celle de ma mère,mais je l'utilise.

translation.en: All right, we'll get you a parking permit.
translation.fr: On va te faireun permis de stationnement.

translation.en: -Do you have cash? -Not so much.
translation.fr: - Tu as du liquide ?- Pas beaucoup.

translation.en: We'll get you some cash.
This is a big fucking day.
Yeah.
Let's celebrate.
-You like champagne? -Yeah.
Cheers.
Thank you.
To your new life, Shannon Shaeffer.
translation.fr: À ta nouvelle vie, Shannon Shaeffer.

translation.en: You've never had champagne, have you?
translation.fr: Tu as jamais bu de champagne ?

translation.en: Here.
Hey, I just really-- I wanna thank you for this opportunity--
translation.fr: Je voulais te remercierpour cette opportunité…

translation.en: First thing we gotta do is fix this. You look like a show pony.
translation.fr: Il faut changer ça.On dirait un poney de concours.

translation.en: We gotta get you some new clothes.
Smell this.
-Are you serious? -Yeah. Smell it.
It's imported leather from Italy. What's that smell like?
translation.fr: C'est du cuir importé d'Italie.Ça sent quoi ?

translation.en: -Oh, imported leather from Italy. -No.
It smells like money.
Smell it again.
Yeah, it's good.
Oh, you have amazing legs.
You have a great figure.
-I don't know about that. -You're hot as shit.
translation.fr: - Je ne sais pas.- Tu es canon.

translation.en: -Step right in. Lily, Glen. -Thank you for seeing us so quickly.
translation.fr: - Entrez. Lily, Glen !- Merci de nous recevoir si vite.

translation.en: I'm glad to see you always.
translation.fr: Je suis toujours content de vous voir.

translation.en: So, how are you doing, champ?
Not so great.
[Hartman] It doesn't look like it.
-Feeling pretty rough? -You could say that.
translation.fr: - Tu te sens mal ?- On peut dire ça.

translation.en: Okay. Well, have a look at this chart.
On a scale of one to 10, where would you say your pain is?
translation.fr: Sur une échelle de un à dix,où tu situes ta douleur ?

translation.en: -I'd say a five or s-- -No, it's a nine.
translation.fr: - Je dirais cinq ou…- Non, neuf.

translation.en: He's feeling like crap and he's not sleeping,
translation.fr: Il se sent mal et il ne dort pas,

translation.en: which means that I'm not sleeping.
-So... -Not sleeping.
Yeah. Whatever you gave me is not working anymore.
translation.fr: Oui. Ce que tu m'as donnéne fait plus effet.

translation.en: No? I gave you Vicodin. It's pretty standard.
translation.fr: Non ? Je t'ai donné de la Vicodine.C'est normal.

translation.en: But I'd like to start you on something new.
translation.fr: J'aimerais te donner un truc nouveau.

translation.en: It's called OxyContin.
It's similar to Vicodin,
but it lasts a full 12 hours without wearing off.
-That would be good. -All right, so...
you will take one in the morning.
translation.fr: tu en prendras un comprimé le matin.

translation.en: You'll take one before you go to bed,
translation.fr: Et un autre avant de dormir,

translation.en: so there will be no waking up in the middle of the night in pain.
translation.fr: pour ne pas te réveilleren pleine nuit avec la douleur.

translation.en: -And I'll get some sleep? -[Hartman] The best.
translation.fr: - Et je dormirai ?- Comme un bébé.

translation.en: -We'll all get sleep. -You will both get the best sleep ever.
translation.fr: - On dormira tous.- Comme des bébés.

translation.en: -It's safe? Okay. -As safe as any other opioid.
translation.fr: - C'est sans danger ?- Oui, comme tous les opioïdes.

translation.en: The good news is, you don't have to take it as often.
translation.fr: Il faut le prendre moins souvent.

translation.en: -Okay. -[Hartman] All right?
-[Lily] Let's try it. -I trust you, Doc.
Get out of here. Go sleep, go sleep better.
translation.fr: Sors d'ici. Va dormir, et bien.

translation.en: Oh, oh, Glen.
I should warn you there is one possible side effect.
translation.fr: Je te préviens,il y a un effet secondaire possible.

translation.en: -What? -[in German accent] The constipation.
Yeah?
-All right. -[in normal voice] Go sleep.
I think we can handle that.
All right. Constipation.
I need to speak to Dr. Coyle, please.
translation.fr: Je dois parler au Dr Coyle.

translation.en: -And you are? -Edie Flowers.
Oh, fuck me.
You motherfucker.
So, I asked you if there was anything else I needed to know, and you said no, right?
translation.fr: J'ai demandé s'il y avait autre choseà savoir et vous avez dit non.

translation.en: -Yeah. Right. -You're not being honest with me.
translation.fr: - Oui. D'accord.- Vous n'êtes pas honnête.

translation.en: -I told you everything. Everything. -You prescribed a new drug,
translation.fr: Je vous ai tout dit. Vous avez prescrit un médicamentdont j'ai jamais entendu parler

translation.en: one I've never even heard of, 1,098 times in six months.
translation.fr: Vous avez prescrit un médicamentdont j'ai jamais entendu parler 1 098 fois en six mois.

translation.en: That's more prescriptions than there are patients, and nearly 5% of Carroll County.
translation.fr: C'est plus d'ordonnances que de patients,et presque 5 % du comté de Carroll.

translation.en: What we both know is that those patients don't exist
and that you are running some dumb, idiotic, little stupid jackass scheme.
translation.fr: que ces patients n'existent paset que c'est une arnaque débile.

translation.en: Now, I gave you a chance.
translation.fr: Je vous ai donné une chance.

translation.en: Now it's gonna hurt.
Okay. Just wait a second, okay?
Dr. Coyle, what can you tell me about OxyContin?
translation.fr: Dr Coyle,que pouvez-vous me dire sur l'OxyContin ?

translation.en: What Purdue did, what Richard Sackler did,
translation.fr: Purdue, et Richard Sackler en particulier,

translation.en: abusing the trust between a doctor and their patient...
translation.fr: ont abusé de la confiancequi lie médecins et patients.

translation.en: selling hope to the most vulnerable people, that's sick on a whole other level.
translation.fr: Vendre de l'espoir aux plus vulnérables,c'est d'un autre niveau.

translation.en: And then Richard Sackler combined two of the most addictive substances:
translation.fr: Richard Sackler a combinédeux choses addictives :

translation.en: greed and opium.
And when you understand that...
When you understand that,
then your brain will never be able to reconcile it.
translation.fr: le cerveau ne peut plus jamais l'oublier.

translation.en: And you will never see the world the same.
translation.fr: Et on voit plusle monde de la même façon.
